storyInfo: The streets are packed for Carnevale. Masked citizens and floats built in the image of beasts parade through the city. Famiglia Venezia attempts to occupy the courthouse, but find dozens of trucks in their way.

attributes.text: Once upon a time, there was a strange pink Nightmare that roamed the wild west.
\n\nIts hide was black charcoal, its hair charred clouds, its horns twisted briar.
\n\nMany were deceived by its beautiful mask, mesmerized by its sweet scent, falling into deep dreams, becoming its nourishment.
The Nightmare targeted Lupo children, once luring thousands of children away from a city in a single night.
\n\nBut the wise Siracusans came up with a way to fight the terrible pink Nightmare—
\n\nThe Nightmare was afraid of wolves. When you saw it, you'd simply cry 'Wolf!' three times, and the Nightmare would disappear without a trace.

attributes.content: That is QUITE enough! I can't listen to any more of this!
No need to get excited, Dolly. The musician isn't wrong; that's what Siracusan legends say about sheep.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: If you're not happy about it, you could always jump on top of his head from your sheep float. After all, no one would be surprised about anything that happens tonight, no matter how out of this world it is.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Look, I just like getting chased by wolves. Playing hide-and-seek with them was one of the few hobbies I had during my time in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: How could they twist the story like that? Blasphemy, I say, blasphemy!
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: That ain't the word I'd pick for it.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Stop throwing cold water on our fun.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: How do the Siracusans see YOU, Emperor?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Tell 'im about the black-robed singer, Big Mouth!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Well... once upon a time, there was a mafia Don who loathed music and banned it in his city, until a penguin singer dressed in a black robe arrived many years later.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: When he started singing at the town square, the citizens, having no concept of music, found it too noisy and tried to catch the singer and hand him over to the Don.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: But the singer was too quick and slippery, even for the most athletic young man.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: He continued to sing as more and more people joined the chase, which eventually turned into a great dance that engulfed the entire city.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: The singer sang for three days and three nights until the furious Don had enough and came to catch him personally. But the Don was caught in the revelry as soon as he walked out of the door, and was never seen again.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Why does Emperor get to sound like a brave, clever hero when he's not half as wise as I am?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: It ain't about wisdom, it's about Graf Pangwen's attitude toward music! Freedom n' struggle! You never did listen to the albums I signed for you, did you?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Let's go, we're getting in the way.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: (Plays excitedly)
attributes.name: Musician

attributes.content: (Juggles excitedly)
attributes.name: Acrobat

attributes.content: (Plays even harder)
attributes.name: Musician

attributes.content: (Shows off skills)
attributes.name: Acrobat

attributes.content: Achille? Where's my Achille?
attributes.name: Passerby A

attributes.content: Did you just realize you had been walking with a stranger for half-an-hour, Signora?
attributes.name: Passerby B

attributes.content: Oh, I recognize your voice! You're that judge from Terni... I'm so sorry, the Leica famiglia made me lie in court—
attributes.name: Passerby A

attributes.content: (Taps mask) All water under the bridge, Signora. Remember the rules of Carnevale?
attributes.name: Passerby B

attributes.content: Look around at the sea of smiles around you! Fool and king, queen and priest, all are the same in their masks. Forget the scores of the past, and let us toast to the future of Nuova Volsinii!
attributes.name: Passerby B

attributes.content: The crowd passes by three Aristocrats of Beasts, as Dolly's clones meander through the sea of people. All can see them; no one shows any surprise.
In this ocean of revelry, not a single sea spray feels out of place.
A dozen massive floats form an orderly row, carrying the visages of wolf, sheep, penguin, cat, dog... legendary beasts that have come together in this city to lead the procession.

The streets are brimming—nay, overflowing—with plays and improvised performances. Musicians and acrobats seem locked in a competition to outdo one another, forcing food cart owners to raise their voices even higher to peddle beer, pizza and ice cream.
This is even more exciting than an active volcano.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Better than the old Carnevale. Even fatso didn't enjoy that kind of party.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Please don't dirty the word 'party' by usin' it on a mafia-masked murder-fest.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: One tree don't bear two fruits. The Siracusans are just like those wolves.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Thousands of years ago, we left the wolves out of our parties because those dumbass pups didn't know nothin' but fighting and killing. So they came up with their own game.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Lucky the Siracusans are smarter, and they decided there's things worth celebrating besides than killing and fighting for territory.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: As for the wolves that don't know how to change—
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: They sense the same thing that we do. They know something is not right.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: We're 'kindred', after all. There are certain things that we need to talk about.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: I've met the ones that are less stupid, but they won't listen to anyone until their stupid game is done.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Well, they got a sayin' in Yan, and it means basically 'When in Londinium, do as the Londiniers do.'
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Now, if this is a party, the Siracusans better not let me down!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: <p=2>November 9th, 1100    9:25 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Wind brushes against Demetri's cheeks.

The windows of the ward were closed when he left yesterday, and Lavinia had instructed the nurse to keep a close eye on the temperature in this autumn season. But he sees only an empty bed when he looks up.
It's been a while, Demetri.
I'm sorry, Signor Bellone, this man insisted on coming in. I tried calling City Hall and the courts to reach Judge Lavinia, but I couldn't get through...
attributes.name: Private Physician

attributes.content: It's okay. You can leave.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: When did you wake up?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The bright lights illuminate the skies and shine upon the hospital ward. The noise of the crowd can be clearly heard even through the window. Leontuzzo stands next to the window, gazing down at a city in revelry.
He has changed out of his patient clothes, and there is no hint that he was in a coma not so long ago.
A few hours ago.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You know, I thought we were meeting up at a restaurant, not a hospital.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Good, you still remember what you were doing before the accident. Looks like it didn't damage your brain.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Tsk.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You sure didn't lose any time to get dressed as soon as you woke up. Don't tell me you plan on attending the festivities.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Surely the nurses have told you that you need to lie down and get some rest... you're still wrapped in bandages underneath those clothes, aren't you?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Just a little light-headed. Got some pills for it, and I feel much better now.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Hundreds of thousands of citizens will be on the streets tonight, celebrating the one-year anniversary of Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The original plan calls for the parade to start from the expansion plate, travel through twenty-three streets across nine plates, where it will be joined by various festivities.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: At midnight, they will arrive at Court Square, where I will address the crowd and welcome a new day together with them—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: City Hall has contingency plans.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Your inauguration can surely wait until you're in better shape.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Do you really think that, Demetri?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leontuzzo turns around.
Lavinia has yet to announce the cancellation of the speech. I don't think it's because she forgot to.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I have a rough idea of what's been going on these few days.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The car accident at the port district, then the fire at Nuova Volsinii port... what will the citizens think if the mayor misses tonight's scheduled event?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If Carnevale concludes without a hitch, then the worst thing that comes out of my absence is that I lose a few approval points.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But if there is something hidden under the bright lights outside the window, I need to be at the scene.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Let's reschedule our dinner to another day.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Today.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The Carnevale has begun. The whole city is busy. Didn't you hear the doctor? Neither City Hall nor the courts are answering phone calls.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I'm afraid they have their hands full, right now.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I brought some people with me. We can escort you to the scene.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You don't have a choice, Leon.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: If you know what's been happening the past few days, then you have at least an inkling of what's going on between me and Saluzzo, but you didn't bring it up.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I have some things I have to tell you. Today is the chance.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Leontuzzo gazes at his old friend.
The threat in Demetri's words are thinly-veiled. After a brief moment of silence, Leontuzzo extends his hand.
I'll be counting on you, then, Demetri.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Just like old times.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: How are you feeling, Grandma?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: You're lost, my child.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: I am looking for the last true wolf. I have wasted too much time.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Easy, my child. It's not your fault.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: Grandma has taught you how to tell the scent of a true wolf's pelt.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: But the last true wolf is clever. He is a weaver of pelts, hiding his scent perfectly. He is a...
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: ...Tailor.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Grandma guides me.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I will find the true wolf. Wait for me, grandma.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: ...de Montano.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Oh, xuj!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Wh-What is it, Lyudmila?
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: ...Red hood.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: That one again? Where?
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: The alley up ahead. I could recognize her from a mile away.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Man, we were just taking a minute to change the tires, and you run into her AGAIN?
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: You want to go after her?
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Let's get back on the truck. Eirene's waiting for us.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I left Sommer at the accident scene the last time in order to go after her, which just seemed to lead to all this crazy shit...
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: You know what's funny? I keep running into bad luck just like I keep running into her. It's like a curse I couldn't shake.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: It's a brutal pack of wolves that we're facing today. I've seen what they're capable of.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: That's why I need to be with you guys, this time.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Well, nothing for you to be ashamed of.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: The bastard taunted you when you tried to take revenge and killed your mentor. You're way calmer than I would be if I was in your shoes.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: You know what, once we get all this crap out of the way tonight, we'll come with you to find her, beat her up, and tie her up behind our trucks so that she gets to know what dust tastes like.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Nobody messes with OUR ragazza sfortunata.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Hah. Well, let's get going.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Dammit, boss, this place was hard to find.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Our guys are in position, but are you sure you don't want to be on scene at a time like this?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Come. Look.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Court Square?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Man, this house is so close to Court Square? I took so many turns on my way here that I thought I ended up in another district. Hell, I could see the posters on the courthouse windows...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Well-concealed, but offers a perfect view of the square and the surrounding streets.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I will be giving orders in real-time from right here, until the dust settles.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: How'd you get your hand on such prime real estate in such a short time?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: It has been under my name for a long time.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I bought it soon after I came to Nuova Volsinii. I come here from time to time, when I wanted some time off.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: ...To stare at the courthouse and City Hall?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: How are things with the old man?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: No problems. The estate's crowded, and they got enough whiskey, cigars, and classic records to keep him busy all night.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: The port?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Gambino got everything set up. Our landship is the only thing that's coming to the city tonight... it's almost time, come to think of it.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: All our vehicles are being deployed around the Nuova Volsinii port. The goods'll be delivered to every associate of the famiglia once the landship has docked.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Then, it's up to us.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Where is the parade procession?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: The new art district, where all the theaters and entertainment establishments are. There's lots of performances on the streets, and activities for visitors to interact with the floats.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: At least an hour until it gets here.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: We have a small number of select famiglia associates nearby, equipped with the weapons that we had smuggled in.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: The square is undermanned, with most of Nuova Volsinii's police keeping order along the parade route. Suppress the courthouse and other administrative buildings quickly and efficiently.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: With the port and the courthouse in our hands, and the supplies from the landship, Famiglia Venezia will become the de facto rulers of Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: It's time for Nuova Volsinii to wake up from revelry.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I just thought of somethin'.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: City Hall's plan calls for the parade to be welcomed at the square by Leontuzzo's inaugural speech, where he's gonna talk about stuff like the new order and Siracusa's future n' whatever...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You gonna say something too when they're welcomed by fully-armed associates of Famiglia Venezia?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: There is no need, Capone.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: If you need to think about something, think about whether you still remember how to use a weapon after all the time you spent working at a vehicle company.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: All good—
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I know your history, Capone. The Sicilians started the first city state war in the history of Siracusa.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: You looted through the city, pointing your weapons at all who would resist or speak up, and harvested the tails of the vanquished with sickles.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: That was Siracusa's first Carnevale, even though the name came later.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: This is your chance to prove that the history of Siracusa began with you, Sicilian.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Well, that sort of talk is better for Gambino. He's the one who could never stop talking about 'Sicilians'.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Lungmen, Volsinii, Nuova Volsinii... we've gone from one place to another over the years. The Sicilians fell on hard times after Signora Sicilia abandoned her familglia.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Which is why I've never forgotten how to pull a trigger.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Good, good.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Do it.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Happy Carnevale, signore! Have a balloon!
attributes.name: 'Carnevale Participant A'

attributes.content: Thanks... hey, wait a minute.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Is the parade here already? I thought I would hear from the folks at the earlier stops.
attributes.name: Police Officer
Police Officer
attributes.content: Gugh—

attributes.name: Police Officer
attributes.content: Y-You're...
Hm. Slower on the uptake than I thought.
attributes.name: 'Carnevale Participant B'

attributes.content: What did you think was gonna happen? This ain't Signor Mayor's promotional video, where we go to the ground as soon as a cop tags us.
attributes.name: 'Carnevale Participant A'

attributes.content: They've been on the job for, what, one year?
attributes.name: 'Carnevale Participant A'

attributes.content: There is no famiglia in Nuova Volsinii. Did you think they would have the skill or the guts to put their head on the line, when all they do is issue traffic tickets?
attributes.name: 'Carnevale Participant A'

attributes.content: Left side of the square is clear.
attributes.name: 'Carnevale Participant C'

attributes.content: Right side, same here.
attributes.name: 'Carnevale Participant D'

attributes.content: The roads that connect the courthouse and the administrative building is secure. No survivors.
attributes.name: 'Carnevale Participant E'

attributes.content: Caught a few paper pushers as they were coming out.
attributes.name: 'Carnevale Participant F'

attributes.content: Damn, one got away and went back into the courthouse—
attributes.name: 'Carnevale Participant F'

attributes.content: Alright, no complaining.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: It's time. Do it!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: What time is it, Texas?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Eleven.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Here's your whiskey with ice.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You've been looking at these route maps over and over again, Lavinia. Take a break.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The area around the square has been cleared of all non-relevant personnel. Traffic control is in effect from the new art district to the courthouse. All that's left is to wait for the procession.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: What's your decision?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You're not concerned that it would cause a panic if it's the 'Last Texas' who makes the midnight speech, rather than the Acting Mayor as originally planned?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: No, I'm not.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Every float tonight is themed after a legendary beast, however mysterious or cruel, and many citizens have put on masks to play the wolf pack.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Beast or man, they will walk together tonight in Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I can think of nothing more appropriate for the Carnevale than having the Last Texas give a speech to the citizens about a better future.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: And I can think of no one else who could take Leontuzzo's place as guest of honor.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Alright, let me see that draft again...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Texas, but I need to prepare for all possible contingencies.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You've looked on edge since you came back from the truckers' camp.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I've done what I could in the time that I had, but the threat hasn't been eliminated. Tonight—
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: J-Judge Lavinia!
attributes.name: Panicking Clerk

attributes.content: What's the matter... is that blood on your clothes?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: A large group suddenly showed up at the square. They took out the police...
attributes.name: Panicking Clerk

attributes.content: Who were they?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I couldn't tell... they were all dressed up in costumes and wearing carnival masks.
attributes.name: Panicking Clerk

attributes.content: But they looked like they're ready to charge into the courthouse!
attributes.name: Panicking Clerk

attributes.content: Get your wounds treated. I'll check it out.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: No, Judge Lavinia! They're all over the square! If you go out now—
attributes.name: Panicking Clerk

attributes.content: If that's the case, hiding here won't do any good.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'm with you.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Stay here, Lavinia.
I'll deal with what's going on outside.
Eirene?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's all wise guys. They want this building, and the Supreme Justice—you.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I'm here to protect you.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Protect me?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: How—
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: What the—
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia rushes to the window.
The pack of beasts that had lay dormant in the darkness begins their hunt.
Elaborately dressed, masked figures emerge from the alleys and approach the courthouse in orderly formation, quickly making their way through the police lines.
And no further.
A truck appears out of nowhere, coming to a screeching stop in their path. The police barricade that it sent flying makes a dull sound as it hits the ground.
Then, a second, and a third, as truck after truck barge into the square.
Demonstrating surprising coordination, they form a tight line between the oncoming crowd and the courthouse, stopping it in its tracks like a dam stops the tide.
They won't get near the courthouse for a while.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I feel like I've seen this before...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Perhaps you've seen City Hall's promotional video for Signor Bellone.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Insurgent mafiosi block off the courthouse with trucks, creating an area in the city where the police cannot reach, allowing them to exact wanton violence...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: That was the inspiration. I wouldn't have thought of it if I wasn't part of the shoot.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Eirene closes the window.
Time is short, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: There is much that we need to resolve.
attributes.name: Eirene
